metadata.title: CVE-2020-18382 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-buffer-overflow in /src/wasm/wasm-binary.cpp inwasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::visitBlock(wasm::Block*) in Binaryen 1.38.26. Acrafted wasm input can cause a segmentation fault, leading todenial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-opt.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
